players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. Charlie, don't trust him."
You: "Charlie, I think you're the mafioso. Diana, can we trust your judgment?"
Charlie: "Be careful, Bob. I am the mafioso and I know what you're thinking."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
